articles.title: Bitcoin tumbles below £13,500 as FTX turmoil continues - City A.M.
articles.description: Bitcoin has plunged below $16,000 (£13, 566) dollars today as investors flee to steadier ground amid turmoil sparked by the collapse of crypto exchange FTX.
